March, 1918, at IE.30 p.m.PRESENT."he Prime Minister (in the Chair)The Rt. Hon. the Viscount Milner, The Rt. Hon. G. N. Barnes, M.P.G.C.B..G.C.M.G.lieutenant-General the Rt. Hon.The Rt. Hon. A. Bonar law, M.P. J. C. Smuts, K.C. *THE FOLLOWIMG WERE ALSO PRESENT:-The Rt. Hon. A. J * Balfour, O.M.,M.P., The Rt. Hon. Lord RobertSecretary of State for Foreign Affairs.
